column1: 2235|Five-and-twenty to eleven|Five-and-twenty to eleven. A horrible hour - a macabre hour
column2: for it is not only the hour of pleasure ended
column3: it is the hour when pleasure itself has been found wanting.

column1: 2235|twenty-five minutes to eleven|If he did not return in fourteen minutes he would have lingered. She looked at the clock. It was twenty-five minutes to eleven. He might enter the inn with Arabella
column2:
as they would reach it before closing time; she might get him to drink with
her; and Heaven only knew what disasters would befall him then.

column1: 2235|10:35 p.m.|10:35 p.m. Frantic now. Have rung Shazzer
column4: Magda. Nobody knows how to programme their videos. Only person I know who knows how to do it is Daniel.
